changeSet.script: db.T_USER.insert( { "_id" : "system", "password" : "b8f57d6d6ec0a60dfe2e20182d4615b12e321cad9e2979e0b9f81e0d6eda78ad9b6dcfe53e4e22d1", "first_name": "", "last_name": "System", "email": "", "activated": "true", "lang_key": "en", "created_by": "system", "created_date": new Date(), "authorities": [{"_id": "ROLE_ADMIN"}, {"_id": "ROLE_USER"}] }); db.T_USER.insert( { "_id" : "anonymousUser", "password" : "4f54479f8290dfd503b72a654faf5d70593eab443993d87a79e14e5f7cda3eb7988423aa99090c9b", "first_name": "Anonymous", "last_name": "User", "email": "", "activated": "true", "lang_key": "en", "created_by": "system", "created_date": new Date(), "authorities": [] }); db.T_USER.insert( { "_id" : "admin", "password" : "b8f57d6d6ec0a60dfe2e20182d4615b12e321cad9e2979e0b9f81e0d6eda78ad9b6dcfe53e4e22d1", "first_name": "", "last_name": "Administrator", "email": "", "activated": "true", "lang_key": "en", "created_by": "system", "created_date": new Date(), "authorities": [{"_id": "ROLE_ADMIN"}, {"_id": "ROLE_USER"}] }); db.T_USER.insert( { "_id" : "user", "password" : "4f54479f8290dfd503b72a654faf5d70593eab443993d87a79e14e5f7cda3eb7988423aa99090c9b", "first_name": "", "last_name": "User", "email": "", "activated": "true", "lang_key": "en", "created_by": "system", "created_date": new Date(), "authorities": [{"_id": "ROLE_USER"}] });
